means: 假扮( disguise的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The extremists entered the building disguised as medical workers.
sentence.Network_cn: 极端分子伪装成医务工作者进入了大楼。
我从头到脚伪装了一番。

sentence.Network_en: This is lust thinly disguised as love.
sentence.Network_cn: 这表面是爱，其实是赤裸的欲望。

考博英语词汇 ... in detail 详细；详尽 in disguise 伪装;乔装;假装；隐瞒；掩饰；假象；貌 in exchange for 交换;调换.

entry.def: If you are in disguise, you are not wearing your usual clothes or you have altered your appearance in other ways, so that people will not recognize you.

example.ex: You'll have to travel in disguise...
He was wearing that ridiculous disguise...

entry.def: If you disguise yourself, you put on clothes which make you look like someone else or alter your appearance in other ways, so that people will not recognize you.

example.ex: She disguised herself as a man so she could fight on the battlefield.
example.tran: 她女扮男装，这样就可以上战场了。

entry.def: To disguise something means to hide it or make it appear different so that people will not know about it or will not recognize it.

example.ex: He made no attempt to disguise his agitation...
example.tran: 他毫不掩饰自己的焦虑不安。

example.ex: Their healthy image disguises the fact that they are highly processed foods...
example.tran: 它们看上去有益健康，实则掩盖了其为精加工食品这一事实。

means.word_mean: 1. having its true character concealed with the intent of misleading;
2. deliberately concealed as if with a veil;

auth_sentence.content: He often disguised himself as one of several personas.
auth_sentence.res_content: He often disguised himself as one of several personas.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He often disguised himself as one of several personas.

auth_sentence.content: Palais Namaskar is a surprisingly well-disguised hub of activity.
auth_sentence.res_content: Palais Namaskar is a surprisingly well-disguised hub of activity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Palais Namaskar is a surprisingly well-disguised hub of activity.

auth_sentence.content: It might have been elegantly disguised sour grapes.
auth_sentence.res_content: It might have been elegantly disguised sour grapes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It might have been elegantly disguised sour grapes.
